description: ObjectSymbol3DLayer is used to symbolize points as 3D shapes.
summary: used to symbolize points as 3D shapes

properties.name: anchor
properties.summary: positioning of the object relative to the point geometry

properties.name: depth
properties.summary: Depth of the object in meters

properties.name: height
properties.summary: Height of the object in meters

properties.name: resource
properties.summary: The shape (primitive) or external 3D model (href) used to visualize the points

properties.name: href
properties.summary: URL linking to the 3D model to be used

properties.name: width
properties.summary: width of the object in meters
